title: "Rituali di iniziazione nell'Ordine di Saint Sampson et du Graal"
first_phrase: This text describes a possible initiation ritual for the Order of Saint Sampson and the Grail. The ritual involves meditation, the blessing of symbols of nobility, loyalty, spirituality, and love, and a pledge to serve the community and respect the Order's values. After the initiation, the candidate is granted a symbol of membership and celebrated with food, drink, music, and storytelling. The text reminds readers that this is just an example and that each order may have a different ritual, but it should respect the order's values and not discriminate or offend anyone. The last 200 tokens discuss the idea of giving the honorary title of valvasore or reserve to members of the Order within the context of a manorial court.
